title: Improve the test runners
body:
**Description of Change**

Currently, `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` will fail because `CodeTaskFactory` is not supported (https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2890) I have switched to using simple MSBuild properties to do the same work. This will have the benefit of allowing the .NET Core tests to be run with `dotnet test` instead of first building the NuGets.

In addition, I have switched to using the new stages feature of DevOps. This makes the process a bit easier and will allow for extensions into the release pipline.

**Bugs Fixed**

Maintainence.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
